data.title: Knicks Hire Derek Fisher As Head Coach
data.meta_description: NEW YORK, June 10, 2014– New York Knickerbockers President Phil Jackson announced today that the team has hired Derek Fisher as the 26th head coach in franchise history. “Today marks the next step of this journey for the New York Knicks franchise as we name Derek to lead the team as its head coach.” Jackson said. “Our relationship began 15 years ago, and over time, it has come clear to me that he and I can form a great partnership once again.”
